summary.description:
A comparison of random-field-theory and false-discovery-rate inference results in the analysis of registered one-dimensional biomechanical datasets.

False discovery rate (FDR) inferences for one-dimensional (1d) data.

||| CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'RFT', 'RFT FDR', 'biomechanical', 'random-field-theory'
summary.name: FDR
